note.note-paragraph: In this subclass non-limiting references (in the sense of paragraph 39 of the Guide to the IPC) may still be displayed in the scheme.

CPC-specific-text.text: Means for mounting tubular or beam shaped sighting or aiming devices on firearms
Mountings with recoil absorbing means
Mountings with a dove tail element, e.g. "Picatinny rail systems"
Mountings with clamping means on the device embracing at least a part of the firearm, e.g. the receiver or a dustcover
Mountings using a pivot point and an anchoring point
the device being rotated in a horizontal plane
the device being tilted in a vertical plane
the device being pivotable about an axis coaxial with the axis of the barrel, e.g. for loading
